articles.title: Tech Mahindra acquires European tech firm for EUR 310 million - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The acquisition of CTC is the second-largest acquisition that the company has made after scam-hit Satyam in April 2010.
articles.content: IT company Tech Mahindra on Monday announced acquisition of 100 per cent stake in Europe-based Com tec Co IT (CTC) and 25 per cent stake in two IT platforms for a total of EUR 330 million (about Rs 2… [+655 chars]
